job_title: New College Grad - Yield Analysis Engineer
job_description:
• New College Grad - Change Management EngineerManassas, Virginia, United States of AmericaPosted a month ago Bachelor’s degree in Materials Science, Electrical, Electronics, Chemical, or related engineering fields.
• New College Grad - Process Integration EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 2 days ago New College Grad - ATE Process Engineer ID1Boise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 3 days ago New College Grad - ENGINEER - PYEBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted a day ago Internship experience in a 300mm semiconductor environment.

• Yield ramp and fabrication processes.
